announcement.title: New Portal Update
announcement.abstract: New features added in updated version of the portal
announcement.message:
The portal has been updated to a new version that has several interesting new features. Students, Staff, and Faculty are encouraged to experiment with these features and add them to their customized view.

  • To create a new tab, click the "Add Tab" button near the top-right of the page.
  • To add content to an existing tab, click the "Customize" tray under the list of tabs.  You can search for content by entering a search term, or you can scroll through to view all available content to add to your personalized portal page.  You can also change your colors or layouts.
  • To re-arrange content on a page, grab the portlet's title and drag it to the new location.

There are many other portlets that we may add to the portal.  You can view a list of available portlets at the Apereo Portlet page, then submit your suggestions using the Suggestions portlet.
announcement.author: admin
